thread.title: The Latest Annoying Sound Showing Up in Every Dang Movie Trailer
thread.title_full: The Latest Annoying Sound Showing Up in Every Dang Movie Trailer

author: Evan Narcisse
title: The Latest Annoying Sound Showing Up in Every Dang Movie Trailer
text:
Go to permalink 
Move over, Inception horns; there’s a new annoyingly ubiquitous sound effect getting spammed into every movie trailer. It’s <<<bwoooruuuu >>>, a deep bass note that you’re probably hearing in your dreams now. 
How do you know when it’s about to get serious and real and seriously real and really serious in a promo clip for a big-budget movie? ***record scratch*** The music tells you so. Of late, the way that’s happening has been with a subwoofer-rattling vibration that viewers are supposed to feel in their molars. A video on the CinemaRaven YouTube channel rounds up dozens of recent instances. Is it over-used? Will trailer shops stop using it? Hell yes and hell no.
